# Component Functions Complete reference for Vista's component creation functions. ## Text Components - **title**: Display large heading text - **subtitle**: Display smaller heading text - **text**: Display regular text - **label**: Display label text ## Button Components - **button**: Create a clickable button - **key_button**: Create a keyboard button ## Input Components - **field**: Single-line text input - **textarea**: Multi-line text input - **select**: Dropdown selection ## Selection Components - **checkbox**: Checkbox control - **toggle**: Toggle switch - **radio**: Radio button ## Container Components - **box**: Basic container box - **panel**: Panel container - **group**: Grouped container ## See Also - [Components](/wiki/core/components/) - Component documentation - [Face Functions](/wiki/core/api-reference/face-functions/) - Face manipulation
